thread.title: Pretty Little Liars final season gets a premiere date | EW.com
thread.title_full: Pretty Little Liars final season gets a premiere date | EW.com

author: Samantha Highfill
title: Pretty Little Liars final season gets a premiere date | EW.com
text:
'Pretty Little Liars': Ian Harding says a 'painful' goodbye 
For Pretty Little Liars fans, the beginning of the end now has a date: Freeform has officially announced that PLL will return for its final season on Tuesday, April 18. 
With its final episodes, PLL fans can expect answers — finally! — along with a number of familiar faces, from Wren to Paige, Melissa, Charlotte, and more. According to the press release, there is a wedding on the way for one of the Liars, but most importantly, the series finale will be two hours, followed immediately by a one-hour tell-all special featuring Troian Bellisario, Ashley Benson, Lucy Hale, Shay Mitchell, Sasha Pieterse, and showrunner I. Marlene King. 
Also on April 18, Freeform will debut its new drama from King, Famous in Love , which is based on the novel by Rebecca Serle and stars Bella Thorne. 
Pretty Little Liars premieres Tuesday, April 18 at 8 p.m. ET, followed by Famous in Love at 9 p.m. ET, both on Freeform.
